choose.when:
SELECT v.* ,(case when ur.role_id = is_back then '退回' when exec_num >= exec_level then '已审核' else '未审核' end ) shenhe_status from ( SELECT v.code,v.batch_num ,count(sn.node_code) total_num ,count(item.node_code) exec_num ,max(case when item.status = '退回' then sn.role_id else 0 end ) is_back from V_JXJC_JYJXCGJ_SHENHE v left join COMMON_SHENHE_NODE sn on sn.shenhe_code = v.shenhe_code left join COMMON_SHENHE_ITEM item on item.relation_code = v.code and item.batch_num = v.batch_num and item.node_code = sn.node_code GROUP BY v.code,v.batch_num ) t left join V_JXJC_JYJXCGJ_SHENHE v on v.code = t.code and v.batch_num = t.batch_num left join COMMON_SHENHE_NODE sn on sn.shenhe_code = v.shenhe_code left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = sn.role_id 1=1 and exec_num >= exec_level-1 -- 只显示上一级‘已审核’的数据 AND 1 != (CASE WHEN sn.exec_level > t.exec_num AND is_back > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -- 排除上一级状态值为‘退回’的数据 and ur.user_id = #{shenHeUserId}
and exec_num >= exec_level
and exec_level > exec_num
and ur.role_id = is_back
ORDER BY shenhe_status DESC
choose.otherwise:
SELECT * from V_JXJC_JYJXCGJ v 1=1
and shenhe_code is not null and status != '退回'
and (shenhe_code is null or status = '退回')
and 1>1
and shenhe_code is null
and status = #{status}
ORDER BY is_submit DESC,create_date DESC

if.test: userId != null and userId != '' and userId !=999999

mapper.select: SELECT count(0) from ( SELECT v.code,v.batch_num ,count(sn.node_code) total_num ,count(item.node_code) exec_num ,max(case when item.status = '退回' then sn.role_id else 0 end ) is_back from V_JXJC_JYJXCGJ_SHENHE v left join COMMON_SHENHE_NODE sn on sn.shenhe_code = v.shenhe_code left join COMMON_SHENHE_ITEM item on item.relation_code = v.code and item.batch_num = v.batch_num and item.node_code = sn.node_code GROUP BY v.code,v.batch_num )t left join V_JXJC_JYJXCGJ_SHENHE v on v.code = t.code and v.batch_num = t.batch_num left join COMMON_SHENHE_NODE sn on sn.shenhe_code = v.shenhe_code left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = sn.role_id where 1=1 and exec_num >= exec_level-1 AND 1 != (CASE WHEN sn.exec_level > t.exec_num AND is_back > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AND exec_level > exec_num and ur.user_id = #{shenHeUserId}
